intro: Mezia, commonly known as the snowbell, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Campanulaceae. These plants are native to temperate regions of the Northern Hemisphere, including Europe, Asia, and North America. Mezia species are typically herbaceous perennials that produce bell-shaped flowers in shades of white, blue, or violet.
